content: I'm a PhD student in Health Science & Technology (HST) at MIT & Harvard Medical School where I'm co-advised by Zak Kohane and Pete Szolovits. My research interests broadly include developing machine learning methods for healthcare with a focus on natural language processing.

title: Emily Alsentzer
